Chen:DEFAULT_CARD.NAME: Uh Oh
Chen:DEFAULT_CARD.DESCRIPTION: This card hasn't been set up properly.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This card hasn't been set up properly.
This card hasn't been set up properly.

Chen:PounceTurnTail.NAME: Pounce
Chen:PounceTurnTail.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL chen:Shapeshift: Cat. NL Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL chen:Shapeshift: Human. NL Gain !B! Block.

Chen:GlitterPoke.NAME: Glitter
Chen:GlitterPoke.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Apply !M! chen:Disoriented. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! chen:Hemorrhage.
chen:Shift. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! chen:Hemorrhage. NL Draw 1 card.

Chen:MisdirectSwipe.NAME: Misdirect
Chen:MisdirectSwipe.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! chen:Disoriented.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! chen:Hemorrhage.

Chen:MeditateFrenzy.NAME: Meditate
Chen:MeditateFrenzy.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Focus. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Deal !D! damage 6 times. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Chen:CatPunch.NAME: Cat Punch
Chen:CatPunch.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block.

Chen:GuardCounter.NAME: Guard
Chen:GuardCounter.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. At the end of this turn, lose !M! Dexterity.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back and apply !M! Hemorrhage.

Chen:Nimbleness.NAME: Nimbleness
Chen:Nimbleness.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] for each Skill drawn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] for each Attack drawn.

Chen:EvasiveFireShift.NAME: Evasive Shift
Chen:EvasiveFireShift.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL chen:Shapeshift: Cat. NL Gain !B! Block. NL If you've chen:Shapeshifted this turn, gain !B! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL chen:Shapeshift: Human. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you've chen:Shapeshifted this turn, gain !B! Block.

Chen:RapidfireEvasive.NAME: Rapidfire
Chen:RapidfireEvasive.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL chen:Spell: Damage. NL Upon playing a Skill, deal !SPELL! damage to a random enemy.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Upon playing an Attack, gain !M! Block.

Chen:StudySharpen.NAME: Study
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! chen:Hemorrhage.

Chen:UpperHand.NAME: Upper Hand
Chen:UpperHand.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has chen:Disoriented, gain [E] and draw !M! card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has chen:Hemorrhage, gain [E] and draw !M! card.

Chen:TauntHiss.NAME: Taunt
Chen:TauntHiss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

Chen:DazzleFlash.NAME: Dazzle
Chen:DazzleFlash.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL chen:Spell: chen:Disoriented. NL Apply !SPELL! chen:Disoriented.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each stack of chen:Disoriented you've applied this combat.

Chen:Panic.NAME: Panic
Chen:Panic.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Play a random Skill in your hand and Exhaust it.
Chen:Panic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Play a random Skill in your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shift. NL Play a random Attack in your hand and Exhaust it.
chen:Shift. NL Play a random Attack in your hand.

Chen:PhoenixWings.NAME: Phoenix's Wings
Chen:PhoenixWings.DESCRIPTION: chen:Spell: Damage. NL chen:Shapeshift: Human. NL Deal !SPELL! damage to ALL enemies, then deal damage equal to the total damage dealt.

Chen:Honk.NAME: Honk
Chen:Honk.DESCRIPTION: Apply 99 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Chen:Shapeshift.NAME: Shapeshift
Chen:Shapeshift.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL chen:Shapeshift. NL Gain !M! Strength, Dexterity, and Focus until the end of the turn.
Chen:Shapeshift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL chen:Shapeshift. NL Gain !M! Strength, Dexterity, and Focus until the end of the turn.

Chen:Sneak.NAME: Sneak
Chen:Sneak.DESCRIPTION: chen:Swift. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional card.
Chen:Sneak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: chen:Swift. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.

Chen:Catseye.NAME: Catseye
Chen:Catseye.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack deals additional damage equal to the amount of chen:Hemorrhage the target has.

Chen:Flit.NAME: Flit
Chen:Flit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard a random card.
Chen:Flit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard a card.

Chen:UnstableBoundary.NAME: Unstable Boundary
Chen:UnstableBoundary.DESCRIPTION: chen:Spell: Block. NL Gain !SPELL! Block. NL The next time you chen:Shapeshift, gain !SPELL! Block.

Chen:BlueOniRedOni.NAME: Blue Oni, Red Oni
Chen:BlueOniRedOni.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shapeshift: Human. NL Add a chen:Blue_Oni and chen:Red_Oni to your hand.
Chen:BlueOniRedOni.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shapeshift: Human. NL Add an upgraded chen:Blue_Oni and chen:Red_Oni to your hand.

Chen:BlueOni.NAME: Blue Oni
Chen:BlueOni.DESCRIPTION: chen:Spell: Damage. NL Deal !SPELL! damage to the farthest right enemy. NL Exhaust.

Chen:RedOni.NAME: Red Oni
Chen:RedOni.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the farthest left enemy. NL Exhaust.

Chen:Flicker.NAME: Flicker
Chen:Flicker.DESCRIPTION: chen:Spell: chen:Disoriented. NL chen:Shapeshift: Human. NL Apply !SPELL! chen:Disoriented. NL Draw !M! cards.

Chen:FlankingStrike.NAME: Flanking Strike
Chen:FlankingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Your next attack this turn deals 50% more damage.

Chen:Tear.NAME: Tear
Chen:Tear.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shapeshift: Cat. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! chen:Hemorrhage.

Chen:Mixup.NAME: Mix Up
Chen:Mixup.DESCRIPTION: chen:Swift. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak.

Chen:RecklessLeap.NAME: Reckless Leap
Chen:RecklessLeap.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shapeshift: Cat. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, draw 1 less card.

Chen:SurpriseAttack.NAME: Surprise Attack
Chen:SurpriseAttack.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL chen:Shapeshift: Cat. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! chen:Disoriented. NL Exhaust.

Chen:Recuperate.NAME: Recuperate
Chen:Recuperate.DESCRIPTION: Remove all debuffs on yourself. NL Exhaust.

Chen:Gash.NAME: Gash
Chen:Gash.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shapeshift: Cat. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! chen:Hemorrhage.

Chen:PhoenixEgg.NAME: Phoenix Egg
Chen:PhoenixEgg.DESCRIPTION: chen:Spell: Hit count. NL chen:Shapeshift: Human. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !SPELL! times.

Chen:Kimontonkou.NAME: Kimontonkou
Chen:Kimontonkou.DESCRIPTION: chen:Spell: Hit count. NL chen:Shapeshift: Human. NL Deal damage equal to the number of chen:Spells played this combat to ALL enemies X + !SPELL! times.

Chen:Salvo.NAME: Salvo
Chen:Salvo.DESCRIPTION: chen:Spell: Damage. NL chen:Shapeshift: Human. NL Deal !SPELL! damage to all enemies. NL Add a copy of this card that deals 3 less damage to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Chen:Shot.NAME: Shot
Chen:Shot.DESCRIPTION: chen:Spell: Damage. NL chen:Shapeshift: Human. NL Deal !SPELL! damage, then deal twice as much damage to a random enemy.

Chen:Assault.NAME: Assault
Chen:Assault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! chen:Hemorrhage to ALL enemies.

Chen:CurlUp.NAME: Curl Up
Chen:CurlUp.DESCRIPTION: chen:Shapeshift: Cat. NL Take 50% less damage for one turn. NL Exhaust.
Chen:CurlUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: chen:Shapeshift: Cat. NL Take 50% less damage for one turn.

Chen:SelfConfidence.NAME: Self-Confidence
Chen:SelfConfidence.DESCRIPTION: Remove all your Block. NL You cannot gain Block for 1 turn. NL Gain !M! Strength and Focus.

Chen:WhateverWorks.NAME: Whatever Works
Chen:WhateverWorks.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL For each card Exhausted, add a random card with its cost reduced by !M! to your hand.
Chen:WhateverWorks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL For each card Exhausted, add a random upgraded card with its cost reduced by !M! to your hand.

Chen:FollowUp.NAME: Follow Up
Chen:FollowUp.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play an Attack each turn, draw 1 card and reduce its cost by 1.

Chen:Possession.NAME: Possession
Chen:Possession.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !M! Focus. NL Upon taking unblocked attack damage, lose all gained Strength and Focus.
Chen:Possession.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !M! Focus. NL Upon taking unblocked attack damage, lose all gained Strength and Focus.

Chen:FinalSpellCard.NAME: Final Spell Card
Chen:FinalSpellCard.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Costs 1 less [E] for each time you lose HP this combat. NL All cards are played 1 additional time. NL All cards have Ethereal and Exhaust.
Chen:FinalSpellCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each time you lose HP this combat. NL All cards are played 1 additional time. NL All cards have Ethereal and Exhaust.

Chen:ShikigamiForm.NAME: Shikigami Form
Chen:ShikigamiForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play !M! random chen:Spell.
Chen:ShikigamiForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play !M! random upgraded chen:Spell.

Chen:PentagramFlight.NAME: Pentagram Flight
Chen:PentagramFlight.DESCRIPTION: chen:Spell: chen:Disoriented. NL Apply !SPELL! chen:Disoriented to ALL enemies. NL Lose 1 Focus.

Chen:Copycat.NAME: Copycat
Chen:Copycat.DESCRIPTION: Put a copy of the next card you play on top of your draw pile.

Chen:Afterimages.NAME: Afterimages
Chen:Afterimages.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL If the enemy intends to attack, its attack is divided into twice as many hits.
